```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r cars}
summary(ANOVA.data)
```

## Plots

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(ANOVA.data)+aes(x=brand, y=dist, color=brand)+geom_boxplot()

```

Hypothesis is "**Is the distance traveled by golf ball different for different brands?**".

```{r}

oneway.test(dist~brand, data=ANOVA.data, var.equal = TRUE)

```
